News.Title: Kothari Sugars & Chemicals: Q3 Profit Soars 610.53% Despite Revenue Decline
News.Summary: Kothari Sugars & Chemicals reported Q3 FY25 results with profit at ₹5.4 crore, up 610.53% YoY, despite revenue falling 37.46% to ₹82.75 crore. EPS increased to ₹0.19, up 111.11% YoY. Operating income rose 259.32% YoY, while expenses were reduced by 23.04% YoY.

News.Title: Kothari Sugars Unit Resumes Operations
News.Summary: Kothari Sugars has announced that one of its units has resumed operations starting January 23. This restart of operations could potentially impact the company's production capacity and financial performance.
